00023 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default_testcase extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00024 
00025         protected $componentManager;
00026         protected $validator;
00027 
00028         protected function setUp() {
00029                 $this->componentManager = F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager::getInstance();
00030                 $this->validator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default");
00031         }
00032 
00033         protected function tearDown() {
00034                 unset($this->validator);
00035                 unset($this->componentManager);
00036         }
00037         
00038         public function test_required() {
00039                 
00040                 $fakeGp = array();
00041                 $fakeGp['firstname'] = "";
00042                 $fakeSettings = array();
00043                 $fakeSettings['fieldConf.']['firstname.']['errorCheck.']['1'] = "required";
00044                 $errors = array();
00045                 $res = $this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors);
00046                 $this->assertFalse($res);
00047                 $expectedErrors = array(
00048                         "firstname" => array(
00049                                 "required"
00050                         )
00051                 );
00052                 $this->assertEquals($errors,$expectedErrors);
00053                 $fakeGp['firstname'] = "something";
00054                 $errors = array();
00055                 $res = $this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors);
00056                 $this->assertTrue($res);
00057                 
00058                 
00059         }
